#summary Resources

= Resources =

Topsy provides access to the following resources:

|| *Name*           || *Description* ||
|| [#search]           || List of results for a query. ||
|| profilesearch    || List of author profiles. ||
|| authorsearch     || List of authors that post about a query. ||
|| searchcount      || Count of results for a search query. ||
|| linkposts        || List of urls posted by an author. ||
|| trackbacks       || List of posts referencing an url. ||
|| trackbackcount   || Count of posts referencing an url. ||
|| urlinfo          || Information about an url. ||
|| authorinfo       || Information about an author. ||
|| tags             || List of tags associated with an url. ||
|| related          || List of related urls for another url. ||

----

== search ==

List of results for a query.

=== Parameters: ===

|| *Name*  || *Type* || *Description* ||
|| q       || string || Search query string. (required) ||
|| window  || string || Time window for results. (optional, default: `auto`) Options: `auto` - automatically pick the most relevant window. `h` last hour, `d` last day, `w` last week, `m` last month, `a` all time ||
|| page    || int    || page number of the result set. (optional, default: `1`, max: `10`) ||
|| perpage || int    || limit number of results per page. (optional, default: `10`, max: `50`) ||

=== Example: ===
{{{
http://otter.topsy.com/search.json?q=New+York
}}}
This will fetch search results in json format for the query new york.

----

== profilesearch ==

List of author profiles.

=== Parameters: ===

|| *Name*  || *Type* || *Description* ||
|| q       || string || Search query string. (required) ||
|| page    || int    || page number of the result set. (optional, default: `1`, max: `10`) ||
|| perpage || int    || limit number of results per page. (optional, default: `10`, max: `50`) ||

=== Example: ===
{{{
http://otter.topsy.com/profilesearch.json?q=Barack+Obama
}}}

This will fetch search results in json format for author profiles that match Barack Obama.

== authorsearch ==

|| *Name*  || *Type* || *Description* ||

|| window  || string || Time window for results. (optional, default: auto) Options: `auto` - automatically pick the most relevant window. `h` last hour, `d` last day, `w` last week, `m` last month, `a` all time ||

----

== searchcount ==

Count of results for a search query.

=== Parameters: ===

|| *Name*   || *Type* || *Description* ||
|| q        || string || Search query string. (required) ||

=== Example: ===

{{{
http://otter.topsy.com/searchcount.json?q=Barack+Obama
}}}

This will fetch only the search result counts in json format for a query of "Barack Obama".

----

== linkposts ==

List of urls posted by an author.

=== Parameters: ===

|| *Name*   || *Type* || *Description* ||
|| url      || string || URL string for the author. (required) ||
|| contains || string || Query string to filter results. (optional) ||
|| page    || int    || page number of the result set. (optional, default: `1`, max: `10`) ||
|| perpage || int    || limit number of results per page. (optional, default: `10`, max: `50`) ||

=== Example: ===

{{{
http://otter.topsy.com/linkposts.json?url=http://twitter.com/barackobama
}}}

This will fetch links in json format posted by Barack Obama.

----

== trackbacks ==

List of posts referencing an url.

=== Parameters: ===

|| *Name*   || *Type* || *Description* ||
|| url      || string || URL string for the target. (required) ||
|| contains || string || Query string to filter results. (optional) ||
|| page    || int    || page number of the result set. (optional, default: `1`, max: `10`) ||
|| perpage || int    || limit number of results per page. (optional, default: `10`, max: `50`) ||

=== Example: ===
{{{
http://otter.topsy.com/trackbacks.json?url=http://twitter.com/
}}}

This will fetch posts in json format that reference Twitter's homepage.

----

== tags ==

List of tags associated with an url.

=== Parameters: ===

|| *Name*   || *Type* || *Description* ||
|| url      || string || URL string for the target. (required either _q_ or _url_) ||
|| q        || string || Query string. (required either _q_ or _url_) ||
|| page    || int    || page number of the result set. (optional, default: `1`, max: `10`) ||
|| perpage || int    || limit number of results per page. (optional, default: `10`, max: `50`) ||

=== Example: ===
{{{
http://otter.topsy.com/tags.json?url=http://twitter.com/
}}}

This will fetch tags associated with Twitter's homepage.

{{{
http://otter.topsy.com/tags.json?url=http://twitter.com/barackobama
}}}

This will fetch tags associated with Barack Obama's Twitter profile.

----

== related ==

List of related urls for another url.

=== Parameters: ===

|| *Name*   || *Type* || *Description* ||
|| url      || string || URL string for the target. (required) ||
|| page    || int    || page number of the result set. (optional, default: `1`, max: `10`) ||
|| perpage || int    || limit number of results per page. (optional, default: `10`, max: `50`) ||

=== Example: ===
{{{
http://otter.topsy.com/related.json?url=http://techcrunch.com/
}}}

This will fetch all the related urls associated with Techcrunch.
